title: The Cosantóirí
description: Alexandra Chadwick has always wondered why the name Chadwick elicits peculiar reactions from the locals. After a shocking tragedy and the gifting of a mysterious key she is about to find out. Most people inherit jewellery, money, or property but Alexandra discovers her inheritance is a position on The Cosantóirí - a secret organisation tasked with protecting portals from the elusive leader of a criminal empire known only as Bas . As Alexandra is thrown into a world of portals, myths, and long held grudges she must learn fast about her history in order to protect her future
author: Zoe Jones
